runes.name: Ahu
runes.bonus: Lucky Hit: Up to a 100% chance against Injured enemies.

runes.name: Bac
runes.bonus: Travel 5 meters.

runes.name: Lith
runes.bonus: Stand still while fighting for 0.3 seconds.

runes.name: Tam
runes.bonus: Cast a non-Channeled Core Skill.

runes.name: Xol
runes.bonus: Evoke power from another Class.

runes.name: Yul
runes.bonus: Cast a Skill with a Cooldown.

runes.name: Feo
runes.bonus: Become Injured or Crowd Controlled (Cooldown: 10 seconds).

runes.name: Neo
runes.bonus: Deal damage after not taking any within 2 seconds. (Resets if Invulnerable.)

runes.name: Noc
runes.bonus: Inflict a Crowd Control that isn't Slow or Chill.

runes.name: Poc
runes.bonus: Spend 5% of your Maximum Resource.

runes.name: Cem
runes.bonus: Cast Evade.

runes.name: Cir
runes.bonus: Cast the same non-Channeled Skill 3 times in a row.

runes.name: Moni
runes.bonus: Cast a Skill after moving. (Cooldown: 0.25 seconds)

runes.name: Yax
runes.bonus: Drink a Healing Potion.

runes.name: Zan
runes.bonus: Cast an Ultimate Skill.

runes.name: Eom
runes.bonus: Reduce your active Cooldowns by 0.1 seconds.

runes.name: Jah
runes.bonus: Replace your next Evade with the Sorcerer's Teleport, blinking further, dealing damage, and becoming Unstoppable.

runes.name: Ohm
runes.bonus: Evoke the Barbarian's War Cry, increasing your Movement Speed and damage dealt.

runes.name: Vex
runes.bonus: Gain +3 to all Skills for 7 seconds.

runes.name: Xan
runes.bonus: Your next Skill cast will be a guaranteed Critical Strike and Overpower.

runes.name: Yom
runes.bonus: Evoke the Druid's Petrify, Stunning enemies and increasing your Critical Strike Damage against them.

runes.name: Kry
runes.bonus: Evoke the Spiritborn's Vortex, dealing damage and Pulling In enemies.

runes.name: Lac
runes.bonus: Evoke the Barbarian's Challenging Shout, reducing your damage taken for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Mot
runes.bonus: Gain a shadow from the Rogue's Dark Shroud, reducing damage taken per shadow.

runes.name: Ner
runes.bonus: Evoke the Rogue's Countering Concealment, gaining Dodge Chance, Movement Speed, Unstoppable, and Stealth.

runes.name: Qax
runes.bonus: Your next non-Basic Skill cast spends all of your Primary Resource to deal up to 100% increased damage.

runes.name: Qua
runes.bonus: Gain 7% Movement Speed for 5 seconds, up to 35%.

runes.name: Que
runes.bonus: Evoke the Druid's Earthen Bulwark, granting yourself a Barrier.

runes.name: Thul
runes.bonus: Evoke the Sorcerer's Mystical Frost Nova, inflicting Freeze and Vulnerable onto enemies.

runes.name: Tzic
runes.bonus: Evoke the Spiritborn's Concussive Stomp, dealing damage and Knocking Down enemies.

runes.name: Wat
runes.bonus: Evoke the Necromancer's Horrid Decrepify, Slowing enemies, reducing their damage, and letting you Execute them.

runes.name: Xal
runes.bonus: Gain 20% Maximum Life for 6 seconds.

runes.name: Zec
runes.bonus: Reduce your active Ultimate Cooldown by 2 seconds.

runes.name: Ceh
runes.bonus: Summon a Spirit Wolf to attack enemies for 8 seconds.

runes.name: Gar
runes.bonus: Gain 2.5% Critical Strike Chance for 5 seconds, up to 25%.

runes.name: Lum
runes.bonus: Restore 1 Primary Resource.

runes.name: Tal
runes.bonus: Evoke the Spiritborn's Pestilent Swarm, dealing damage to enemies.

runes.name: Teb
runes.bonus: Evoke the Necromancer's Abhorrent Iron Maiden, counterattacking damage from enemies and Healing you when they die.

runes.name: Tec
runes.bonus: Evoke the Barbarian's Earthquake, dealing damage to enemies within.

runes.name: Ton
runes.bonus: Evoke the Sorcerer's Meteorites, dealing damage to enemies.

runes.name: Tun
runes.bonus: Evoke the Rogue's Stun Grenades, Stunning and dealing damage to enemies.
